message.body: Have you been able to charge your phone? If so, can we please talk tonight?
It's charged but I need space. That song was lovely tim, but too much. I'll be in touch.
(01/02) I'm sorry I did that. But can we please talk? This is killing me Martha. Be in touch makes me crazy and you've given me no reason to believe it. You owe
(02/02) it to me to answer questions that you've left unanswered. I'm begging you.
I can't talk tonight. You can't corner me like that and give me no option.
Corner you to do what?
To talk. I'm not going to text you back tonight, ok? I have so much to do for school. Im sorry.
(01/02) Ok, i understand. I don't mean to corner you. You can always say no. It's just that you keep saying no and I need you to say yes every so often. Or say
(02/02) anything at all. Thanks for at least telling me you won't text back. I'm sorry I'm being so crazy. I'm trying hard. Good luck with school Mattie
(01/02) Should I assume you're too busy to talk tonight? I'm free tonight, anytime tomorrow, any time the next day etc. I can wait but being ignored hurts a lot
(02/02) . I know you don't want me to text you but I need something to let me know you're not cutting me out entirely
Tim I'm not I'm just so fucking busy with work from the end of the school day until now when I get out. Don't push me please
I'm really sorry Mattie. Really. I'm proud of you for doing what you're doing and admire it. Hope you get some time to relax.
(01/02) Hey I'm really sorry about last night. If I would've known I would've let you alone. I'm trying so hard to give you the space you request, but can you p
(02/02) lease, as a friend, give me even a general idea of when we can speak? I have uncontrollable anxiety without that prospect.
Is this a casual conversation or something more weighty?
Why does it matter?
Bc I'm totally exhausted and need to know how much energy that I'll be expending so I can plan
(01/02) Probably both. I want to hear about your life but i also have so many emotions. I don't want to pressure you and if you simply don't want to talk with m
(02/02) e then I'll deal.

I just don't know how much help I'll be with some emotions. I don't know if I'm the person to help you and that's a super painful thought which already makes me feel unprepared and emotionally wrecked.
What thought?
That I can't help you
(01/02) Cant or don't want to? you're the only one who might be able to, and I know you can. I'm not expecting you to be able to fix me. But if we can't talk a
(02/02) bout this then how can we maintain a friendship? Is that important to you?
It is important to me. I'll call in an hour or so
I hate the idea that you'd ever feel unprepared to talk to me Mattie. It's just me
That last conversation wrecked me for days
Me too. Actually just a high point in an ongoing wreck. But the thought of not talking wrecks me even more. Please don't fear me. I don't want to hurt you.
It does hurt me though Tim. Quite a bit. There's nothing i can do about your pain right now
Do you want me to call?
Don't ignore me, it'll make me worry
Believe me I know the feeling. Sorry I was having intense convo with Jon. Of course I do want you to call.
